location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 14 of 1833 from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire to Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a communication received by the Resident from the Government Agent at Sharga [Sharjah] concerning the progress of the Wahabee [Wahhabi] sect in Arabia, along with another enclosure from the Government Agent at Muscat; copies of these enclosures are not provided in this volume. It notes the Resident's opinion that the Imam of Muscat cannot maintain his independence in the event of a Wahabee ascendency.
